ç±»ä¼¼åŠŸèƒ½çš„ä¸åŒæŠ€æœ¯ä¾§é‡ç‚¹ä¸åŒï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚åŒæ ·æ˜¯æ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œæœ‰æ™®é€šçš„å…³ç³»å‹æ•°æ®åº“ å¦‚ MySQLï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰å›¾æ•°æ®åº“å¦‚ Neo4J, è¿˜æœ‰æ—¶é—´åºåˆ—æ•°æ®åº“ InfluxDB ç­‰ã€‚

JSON åºåˆ—åŒ–æ”¯æŒè·¨è¯­è¨€ï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦åƒ XML å­˜åœ¨å¤§é‡çš„æ ‡ç­¾ä»£ç ï¼Œç»“æ„æ¸…æ™°ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä¸¢å¤±äº†ç±»å‹ï¼Œå¦‚çœ‹ä¸å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªæ•´æ•°æ˜¯ Integer ç±»å‹ è¿˜æ˜¯ Long ç±»å‹ã€‚

@Data
public class Address implements Serializable {
    private Long id;

    private String detail;
}

æ„é€ å¯¹è±¡ï¼š

Address address = new Address();
address.setId(1L);
address.setDetail("é¥è¿œçš„åœ°æ–¹");

å•å…ƒæµ‹è¯•å¯¹æ¯”åŸç”Ÿåºåˆ—åŒ–ã€JSON åºåˆ—åŒ–ã€ Hessianåºåˆ—åŒ–å’ŒHessian2 å¯¹åºåˆ—åŒ–åçš„æ•°æ®è¿›è¡Œå¯¹æ¯”ï¼š

 @Test
    public void serializeCompare() throws IOException {
        doJdkSerialize();
        doJsonSerialize();
        doHessianSerialize();
        doHessian2Serialize();
    }

    /**
     * Java åºåˆ—åŒ–
     */
    private void doJdkSerialize() {
        byte[] serialize = SerializationUtils.serialize(address);
        System.out.println(serialize.length + "å­—èŠ‚");
        System.out.println(new String(serialize));
    }

    /**
     * JSON åºåˆ—åŒ–
     */
    public void doJsonSerialize() {
        String jsonString = JSON.toJSONString(address);
        System.out.println(jsonString.getBytes().length + "å­—èŠ‚");
        System.out.println(jsonString);
    }

    /**
     * Hessian åºåˆ—åŒ–
     */
    public void doHessianSerialize() throws IOException {
        ByteArrayOutputStream byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
        HessianOutput hessianOutput = new HessianOutput(byteArrayOutputStream);
        hessianOutput.writeObject(address);
        byte[] bytes = byteArrayOutputStream.toByteArray();
        System.out.println(bytes.length + "å­—èŠ‚");
        System.out.println(new String(bytes));
    }

    /**
     * Hessian2 åºåˆ—åŒ–
     */
    public void doHessian2Serialize() throws IOException {
        ByteArrayOutputStream byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
        Hessian2Output hessian2Output = new Hessian2Output(byteArrayOutputStream);
        hessian2Output.writeObject(address);
        hessian2Output.flushBuffer();
        byte[] bytes = byteArrayOutputStream.toByteArray();
        System.out.println(bytes.length + "å­—èŠ‚");
        System.out.println(new String(bytes));
    }

69å­—èŠ‚

C0%com.imooc.effectivejava.clone.Addressï¿½iddetail`ï¿½é¥è¿œçš„åœ°æ–¹

å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡º Java åŸç”Ÿåºåˆ—åŒ–ä¿å­˜äº†å¯¹è±¡å’Œå±æ€§çš„ç±»å‹å’Œæ•°å€¼ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯éå¸¸å†—é•¿ã€‚

JSON åºåˆ—åŒ–è™½ç„¶å¯ä»¥å¯è¯»æ€§å¾ˆå¼ºï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ— æ³•ç²¾ç¡®æ„ŸçŸ¥ç±»å‹ã€‚

Hessian åºåˆ—åŒ–æ—¢ä¿ç•™äº†ç±»å‹ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ¯” Java åŸç”Ÿåºåˆ—åŒ–æ›´ç®€æ´ã€‚

æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ junitperf ç®€å•å¯¹æ¯”ä¸‹æ€§èƒ½ï¼š

ç¼–å†™å•æµ‹ä»£ç ï¼š

@JunitPerfConfig(threads = 10, warmUp = 1_000, duration = 30_000
        , reporter = {HtmlReporter.class})
public void jdkSerialize() {
    doJdkSerialize();
}

@JunitPerfConfig(threads = 10, warmUp = 1_000, duration = 30_000
        , reporter = {HtmlReporter.class})
public void jsonSerialize() {
    doJsonSerialize();
}

@JunitPerfConfig(threads = 10, warmUp = 1_000, duration = 30_000
        , reporter = {HtmlReporter.class})
public void hessianSerialize() throws IOException {
    doHessianSerialize();
}

ä¸‰ç§åºåˆ—åŒ–æ–¹å¼ï¼Œåœ¨é¢„çƒ­ 1 ç§’é’Ÿï¼Œ 10ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹ï¼ŒæŒç»­æ‰§è¡Œ 30 ç§’çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œæ€§èƒ½è¡¨ç°å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š


åœ¨ç›¸åŒæ—¶é•¿æƒ…å†µä¸‹ Hessian2 è°ƒç”¨æ•°æœ€å¤šï¼Œååé‡æ›´å¤§ï¼›JSON åºåˆ—åŒ–æ¬¡ä¹‹ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”å·®è·å¾ˆå°ã€‚Java åŸç”Ÿåºåˆ—åŒ–æ–¹å¼å†æ¬¡ï¼Œ Hession è°ƒç”¨æ•°ã€ååé‡å’Œå¹³å‡å»¶è¿Ÿæ˜æ˜¾è¡¨ç°æ›´å·®ã€‚
